title: gobox
desc: The predecessor to 'pndo.me'. A general-purpose file sharing application developedusing Go and JavaScript.

title: iizu.me
desc: Free and open source mobile application and API for browsing, downloading and reading manga.

title: kurisu
desc: Kurisu is a general-purpose chat bot for the online community app Discord. Made with the amazing Filip Ekström ✨.

title: sorbet
desc: A very mini game engine with a simple physics engine and entity component system.

title: paint32
desc: Simple paint application with pen and bucket tool. Built alongside a presentation to demonstrate the floodfill algorithm (Algorithm analysis class)
